name: 陳柏均
objective:
本課程將介紹奈米科技之基本原理及最新發展，內容涵蓋傳統與先進製程之發展、掃描探針技術、奈米材料特性、奈米材料製程技術、奈米電子材料等。本課程亦將提供基本材料科學之簡介以利修課同學銜接。

This course provides an introduction to some of the fundamentals and current state-of-the-art in Nanotechnology. The topics that will be covered include: Conventional and Advance Lithography, Scanning Probes, Nanomaterials Properties, Nanomaterial Synthesis, Nanomaterial Electronics, Bottom-up/Top-Down Nanomaterial Integration and Assembly. This course also gives an overview of a broad range of topics, and it will discuss theoretical aspects in fundamental materials science.
schedule:
課程主題:
1.　　奈米科技概說
2.　　材料基本觀念
3.　　奈米檢測與分析
4.　　奈米製程技術
5.　　奈米結構碳材
6.　　奈米電子材料與機電系統
7.　　奈米化學
8.　　奈米生物科技
